contactForm.heading: Let Us Help You
contactForm.subHeading: Get a free consultation from our team
contactForm.description: You can write to us at any time and we will respond to your messages as soon as possible

footer.aboutDescription: SA Cosmos is more than a job board, it's a dynamic ecosystem where talent meets opportunity. Elevate your career with us as you navigate through a plethora of offerings!

whyCosmos.certifiedTranslationDesc: Certified translations are for official uses where your receiver requires certification to verify that the translation is complete and accurate
whyCosmos.culturalDiversityDesc: Interpreting and culturally sensitive information provision has been developed in order to reduce barriers to communication with migrants in consultation processes in a way that is tailored to the target group.
whyCosmos.assistRollDesc: The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from 'de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum'
